0:{"buildId":"QkLRzJdEtiMW6LJrOlnvh","rsc":["$","$1","c",{"children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex min-h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]","children":[["$","$L2",null,{"groups":[{"title":"Web Servers","items":[{"id":"nginx","title":"NGINX","slug":"nginx","items":[{"id":"nginx-container","title":"Run as Container","slug":"nginx/container"},{"id":"nginx-ssl","title":"OpenSSL for Testing","slug":"nginx/ssl"},{"id":"nginx-pam","title":"PAM Authentication","slug":"nginx/pam"},{"id":"nginx-static","title":"Deploy Static App","slug":"nginx/static"}]},{"id":"caddy","title":"Caddy","slug":"caddy","items":[{"id":"caddy-container","title":"Deploy as Container","slug":"caddy/container"}]}]},{"title":"Databases","items":[{"id":"mysql","title":"MySQL","slug":"mysql","items":[{"id":"mysql-container","title":"Deploy as Container","slug":"mysql/container"},{"id":"mysql-backup","title":"Backup & Restore","slug":"mysql/backup-restore"}]},{"id":"cassandra","title":"Cassandra","slug":"cassandra","items":[{"id":"cassandra-container","title":"Deploy as Container","slug":"cassandra/container"},{"id":"cassandra-backup","title":"Backup & Restore","slug":"cassandra/backup-restore"},{"id":"cassandra-cluster","title":"Multi-Node Cluster","slug":"cassandra/cluster"}]}]}],"basePath":"/docs","title":"General Docs"}],["$","main",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 py-8","children":["$","article",null,{"className":"prose prose-invert max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-white mb-2","children":"Run NGINX as Container"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-400 text-lg mb-8","children":"Deploy NGINX as a Docker container with custom configuration"}],["$","$L3",null,{"content":"\n# üåê Run NGINX as Container\n\nNGINX is a high-performance web server and reverse proxy. Running it as a container provides flexibility and ease of deployment.\n\n## Quick Start\n\n```bash\ndocker run -d -p 80:80 --name nginx nginx:alpine\n```\n\n## With Custom Configuration\n\nCreate a `docker-compose.yml`:\n\n```yaml\nversion: '3.8'\nservices:\n  nginx:\n    image: nginx:alpine\n    ports:\n      - \"80:80\"\n      - \"443:443\"\n    volumes:\n      - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro\n      - ./html:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro\n    restart: unless-stopped\n```\n\n## Dockerfile\n\n```dockerfile\nFROM nginx:alpine\nCOPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf\nCOPY html/ /usr/share/nginx/html/\nEXPOSE 80 443\nCMD [\"nginx\", \"-g\", \"daemon off;\"]\n```\n\n## See Also\n\n- [OpenSSL for Testing](/docs/nginx/ssl)\n- [PAM Authentication](/docs/nginx/pam)\n- [Deploy Static App](/docs/nginx/static)\n"}]]}]}]}]]}],[["$","script","script-0",{"src":"/_next/static/chunks/e0ade9baf00eab87.js","async":true}]],["$","$L4",null,{"children":["$","$5",null,{"name":"Next.MetadataOutlet","children":"$@6"}]}]]}],"loading":null,"isPartial":false}
